title: Joseph Ratzinger - Pope Benedict XVI - 82 books
description:
Here are 76 books by Joseph Ratzinger, aka Pope Benedict XVI, and six books about him.

Includes calibre covers and metadata.

Since there are so many files, I've zipped them up.

Includes, among many others:

--The three volumes of Jesus of Nazareth
--Numerous collections of public talks
--Introduction to Christianity
--Numerous other theological works published before Ratzinger became Pope
--Encyclicals 
--Etc., etc.

Books about him include:

--A children's biography
--Several studies of his theology and social and political thought
--An account of his election to the papacy

I believe all the books are from retail sources; the vast majority are in epub and mobi formats. A few are pdf only.

---

Many thanks to the original uploaders.

---


The torrent does NOT include (for example) The Ratzinger Report, Salt of the Earth, God and the World, or God Is Near Us. If they turn up, I'll post them later.
